ProjectTitle: SenOx: a next-generation bioresorbable oxygen sensor for tumor hypoxia monitoring
InitialFeedbackHistory:
15/02/2023
Metadata: will you generate any metadata with your measurements? For more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata
Preservation/Sharing: Please note that Zenodo is not just for archiving but mainly for data sharing, even when keeping data under restricted access or embargo your metadata will be openly available, since you mention valorization discuss with LRD (lrd@kuleuven.be) before depositing any data. Also note that instead of Zenodo you can use the KU Leuven data repository RDR https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr.
label: good with suggestions
